mainBoard.name: Minas Tirith Garrison

rulings.text: If Minas Tirith Garrison is untapped as its last ability resolves, it can be tapped for its own last ability.

If an attacking Human is tapped for Minas Tirith Garrison's ability (perhaps because it has vigilance or it was untapped after being declared as an attacker), that Human remains an attacking creature.

You choose how many and which creatures to tap while Minas Tirith Garrison's last ability is resolving. No player may take any other actions between the time you make this choice and the time at which you draw cards.

mainBoard.text:
Minas Tirith Garrison's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Whenever Minas Tirith Garrison attacks, you may tap any number of untapped Humans you control. Draw a card for each Human tapped this way.

mainBoard.name: Lórien Revealed
mainBoard.originalText:
Draw three cards.
Islandcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

rulings.text: Typecycling is a form of cycling. Any ability that triggers on a card being cycled also triggers on a card being typecycled. Any ability that stops a cycling ability from being activated also stops a typecycling ability from being activated.

Unlike the normal cycling ability, typecycling doesn't allow you to draw a card. Rather, it lets you search your library for a card with the type or types indicated by the ability name. For example, a card with basic landcycling lets you search for a basic land card, and a card with Wizardcycling lets you search for a Wizard card.

mainBoard.text:
Draw three cards.
Islandcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

foreignData.name: Lutz Farning, Gauner aus Bree
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn Lutz Farning, Gauner aus Bree, geblockt wird, bestimme eines —
• Erzeuge einen Schatz-Spielstein. (Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.")
• Ein Gegner deiner Wahl übernimmt die Kontrolle über ein Pferd deiner Wahl, das du kontrollierst. Falls er dies tut, entferne Lutz Farning aus dem Kampf und erzeuge drei Schatz-Spielsteine.

foreignData.name: Bill Helechal, estafador de Bree
foreignData.text:
Siempre que Bill Helechal, estafador de Bree sea bloqueado, elige uno:
• Crea una ficha de Tesoro. (Es un artefacto con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color".)
• El oponente objetivo gana el control del Caballo objetivo que controlas. Si lo hace, remueves a Bill Helechal del combate y creas tres fichas de Tesoro.

foreignData.name: Bill Ferny, brigand de Bree
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois que Bill Ferny, brigand de Bree devient bloqué, choisissez l'un —
• Créez un jeton Trésor. (C'est un artefact avec « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix. »)
• Un adversaire ciblé acquiert le contrôle d'un cheval ciblé que vous contrôlez. S'il fait ainsi, retirez Bill Ferny du combat et créez trois jetons Trésor.

foreignData.name: ブリー村の詐欺師、ビル・ファーニィ
foreignData.text:
ブリー村の詐欺師、ビル・ファーニィがブロックされた状態になるたび、以下から１つを選ぶ。
・宝物・トークン１つを生成する。（それは、「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
・対戦相手１人と、あなたがコントロールしている馬１体を対象とする。その前者はその後者のコントロールを得る。そうしたなら、ブリー村の詐欺師、ビル・ファーニィを戦闘から取り除き、宝物・トークン３つを生成する。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・ならず者

foreignData.name: Bill Samambaia, Vigarista de Bree
foreignData.text:
Toda vez que Bill Samambaia, Vigarista de Bree, for bloqueado, escolha um —
• Crie uma ficha de Tesouro. (Ela é um artefato com "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor".)
• O oponente alvo ganha o controle do Cavalo alvo que você controla. Se ele fizer isso, remova Bill Samambaia do combate e crie três fichas de Tesouro.

foreignData.text:
每当布理骗子比尔·蕨尼被阻挡时，选择一项～
•派出一个珍宝衍生物。（它是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）
•目标对手获得目标由你操控的马之操控权。若其如此作，则将比尔·蕨尼移出战斗且你派出三个珍宝衍生物。

mainBoard.name: Bill Ferny, Bree Swindler
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever Bill Ferny, Bree Swindler becomes blocked, choose one —
• Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
• Target opponent gains control of target Horse you control. If they do, remove Bill Ferny from combat and create three Treasure tokens.

rulings.text: If Bill Ferny, Bree Swindler is removed from combat, it remains tapped if it was tapped.
The ability triggers only once, no matter how many creatures are blocking it.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever Bill Ferny, Bree Swindler becomes blocked, choose one —
• Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
• Target opponent gains control of target Horse you control. If they do, remove Bill Ferny from combat and create three Treasure tokens.

mainBoard.flavorText: "This is the hour of the Shire-folk, when they arise from their quiet fields to shake the towers and counsels of the Great. Who of all the Wise could have foreseen it?"

foreignData.flavorText: „Dies ist die Stunde des Auenvolks, in der es seine ruhigen Felder hinter sich lässt und die Türme und Räte der Großen zum Wanken bringt. Welcher aller Weisen hätte das vorhersehen können?"
foreignData.name: Elrond, Herr von Bruchtal
foreignData.text: Immer wenn Elrond, Herr von Bruchtal, oder eine andere Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, wende Hellsicht 1 an. Falls dies das zweite Mal ist, dass diese Fähigkeit in diesem Zug verrechnet wird, führt der Ring dich in Versuchung.

foreignData.flavorText: "Es el momento de los habitantes de la Comarca, que dejan los campos sosegados para agitar las torres y los concilios de los Grandes. ¿Quién de todos los Sabios podría haberlo previsto?".
foreignData.name: Elrond, señor de Rivendel
foreignData.text: Siempre que Elrond, señor de Rivendel u otra criatura entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, adivina 1. Si es la segunda vez que esta habilidad se resolvió este turno, el Anillo te tienta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Voici venue l'heure où les habitants de la Comté se lèvent de leurs champs paisibles pour faire trembler les tours et les conseils des Grands. Qui entre tous les Sages aurait pu le prédire ? »
foreignData.name: Elrond, seigneur de Fondcombe
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'Elrond, seigneur de Fondcombe ou une autre créature arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, regard 1. Si c'est la deuxième fois que cette capacité s'est résolue ce tour-ci, l'Anneau vous tente.

foreignData.flavorText: "Questa è l'ora della Contea, le cui genti si innalzeranno dalla pace dei loro campi per far tremare le torri e i consigli dei potenti. Quale saggio avrebbe mai potuto prevederlo?"
foreignData.name: Elrond, Signore di Gran Burrone
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta Elrond, Signore di Gran Burrone o un'altra creatura entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, profetizza 1. Se è la seconda volta che si è risolta questa abilità in questo turno, l'Anello ti tenta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「ホビット庄民の時は来た。今こそ静かな丘より歩み出て、偉大なる会合を揺るがすのだ。このような事態を、賢き者の誰が予見できたであろう？」
foreignData.name: 裂け谷の王、エルロンド
foreignData.text: 裂け谷の王、エルロンドやこれでないクリーチャー１体があなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、占術１を行う。この能力がこのターン内で２回目に解決されたとき、指輪があなたを誘惑する。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — エルフ・貴族

foreignData.flavorText: "Chegou a hora do povo do Condado, quando eles se levantam de seus pacatos campos para abalar as torres e concílios dos grandes. Quem de todos os sábios poderia tê-lo previsto?"
foreignData.name: Elrond, Senhor de Valfenda
foreignData.text: Toda vez que Elrond, Senhor de Valfenda, ou outra criatura entrar no campo de batalha sob seu controle, use vidência 1. Se esta for a segunda vez que esta habilidade é resolvida neste turno, o Anel tenta você.

foreignData.flavorText: 「这一时刻属于夏尔的子民，他们从宁静田野中挺身而出，撼动伟人的高塔与议会。又有哪位智者曾预见到这一刻？」
foreignData.name: 幽谷领主埃尔隆德
foreignData.text: 每当幽谷领主埃尔隆德或另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，占卜1。若这是此异能在本回合第二次的结算，则魔戒引诱你。

mainBoard.name: Elrond, Lord of Rivendell
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Elrond, Lord of Rivendell or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, the Ring tempts you.

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text: Whenever Elrond, Lord of Rivendell or another creature you control enters, scry 1. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, the Ring tempts you.

mainBoard.flavorText: The black horses were filled with madness, and leaping forward in terror they bore their riders into the rushing flood.

foreignData.flavorText: Die schwarzen Rösser wurden von Wahnsinn ergriffen und sie sprangen mit ihren Reiter vorwärts in die reißenden Fluten.
foreignData.name: Flut der Bruinenfurt
foreignData.text: Bringe bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück. Hellsicht 1. Der Ring führt dich in Versuchung.

foreignData.flavorText: Los caballos negros se volvieron locos y, dominados por el terror, saltaron hacia adelante y precipitaron a los jinetes a las aguas violentas.
foreignData.name: Caballos del Bruinen
foreignData.text: Regresa hasta dos criaturas objetivo a las manos de sus propietarios. Adivina 1. El Anillo te tienta.

foreignData.flavorText: Les chevaux noirs furent pris de folie, et précipités en avant par leur peur, ils entraînèrent leurs cavaliers dans les flots déchaînés.
foreignData.name: Chevaux de la Bruinen
foreignData.text: Renvoyez jusqu'à deux créatures ciblées dans les mains de leurs propriétaires. Regard 1. L'Anneau vous tente.

foreignData.flavorText: I cavalli neri furono colti dal terrore e, in preda alla follia, portarono i loro cavalieri dritti verso l'inondazione.
foreignData.name: Cavalli del Bruinen
foreignData.text: Fai tornare fino a due creature bersaglio in mano ai rispettivi proprietari. Profetizza 1. L'Anello ti tenta.

foreignData.flavorText: 黒き馬たちは狂気に囚われ、恐れのあまり、襲い来る洪水に騎手諸共飛び込んでいった。
foreignData.name: ブルイネンの馬流し
foreignData.text: クリーチャー最大２体を対象とする。それらをオーナーの手札に戻す。占術１を行う。指輪があなたを誘惑する。

foreignData.flavorText: A loucura tomou os cavalos negros e, saltando adiante aterrorizados, eles carregaram seus cavaleiros para dentro da enxurrada.
foreignData.name: Cavalos do Bruinen
foreignData.text: Devolva até duas criaturas alvo para as mãos de seus donos. Vidência 1. O Anel tenta você.

foreignData.flavorText: 那些黑马全都发狂起来，惊恐地大步前冲，纷纷载着骑手一头扎进滚滚洪流当中。
foreignData.name: 布茹依能骏马
foreignData.text: 将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。占卜1。魔戒引诱你。

mainBoard.name: Horses of the Bruinen
mainBoard.originalText: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Scry 1. The Ring tempts you.

rulings.text: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become (or remain) your Ring-bearer.
Each player can have only one emblem named The Ring and only one Ring-bearer at a time.
Each time the Ring tempts you, you must choose a creature if you control one.

If the creature you choose as your Ring-bearer was already your Ring-bearer, that still counts as choosing that creature as your Ring-bearer for the purpose of abilities that trigger "whenever you choose a creature as your Ring-bearer" or abilities that care about which creature was chosen as your Ring-bearer.

Some spells and abilities that cause the Ring to tempt you may require targets. If each target chosen is an illegal target as that spell or ability tries to resolve, it won't resolve. The Ring won't tempt you.
The Ring can tempt you even if you don't control a creature. In this case, abilities that trigger "whenever the Ring tempts you" will still trigger.
The Ring gains its abilities in order from top to bottom. Once it gains an ability, it has that ability for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Scry 1. The Ring tempts you.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Your Quest stands upon the edge of a knife. Stray but a little and it will fail, to the ruin of all. Yet hope remains while all the Company is true."

foreignData.flavorText: „Euer Vorhaben steht auf Messers Schneide. Weicht nur ein wenig von eurem Weg ab, und ihr werdet scheitern, zum Untergang aller. Aber noch besteht Hoffnung, solange alle Gefährten reinen Herzens sind."
foreignData.name: Galadriels Spiegel
foreignData.text: {5}, {T}: Hellsicht 1, ziehe dann eine Karte. Diese Fähigkeit kostet beim Aktivieren für jede legendäre Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.

foreignData.flavorText: "Tu misión avanza por el filo de un cuchillo. Un solo paso en falso y fracasará, y nos arruinará a todos. Sin embargo, hay esperanzas mientras todos los miembros de la Compañía sigan siendo fieles".
foreignData.name: Espejo de Galadriel
foreignData.text: {5}, {T}: Adivina 1, luego roba una carta. Te cuesta {1} menos activar esta habilidad por cada criatura legendaria que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Votre quête ne tient qu'à un fil. Écartez-vous-en ne serait-ce qu'un peu et elle échouera, pour la ruine de tous. Pourtant, l'espoir subsiste tant que toute la Compagnie est sincère. »
foreignData.name: Miroir de Galadriel
foreignData.text: {5}, {T} : Regard 1, puis piochez une carte. Cette capacité coûte {1} de moins à activer pour chaque créature légendaire que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: "La tua Impresa si trova sul filo del rasoio. Discostati un poco e fallirai, condannando tutti. Eppure la speranza vive insieme alla Compagnia."
foreignData.name: Specchio di Galadriel
foreignData.text: {5}, {T}: Profetizza 1, poi pesca una carta. Questa abilità costa {1} in meno per essere attivata per ogni creatura leggendaria che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 「お前の旅は刃の縁を歩くが如く不安なものだ。少しでも道を逸れようものなら旅は失敗し、全ては破滅へ向かうだろう。しかし一行が共にある限り、希望は残っている。」
foreignData.name: ガラドリエルの鏡
foreignData.text: {5}, {T}：占術１を行う。その後、カード１枚を引く。この能力を起動するためのコストは、あなたがコントロールしている伝説のクリーチャー１体につき{1}少なくなる。
foreignData.type: 伝説のアーティファクト

foreignData.flavorText: "Sua Demanda está no fio da navalha. Desvie-se um pouco sequer e ela fracassará, para a ruína de todos. Mesmo assim resta esperança enquanto toda a Sociedade permanecer fiel."
foreignData.name: Espelho de Galadriel
foreignData.text: {5}, {T}: Use vidência 1, depois compre um card. Esta habilidade custa {1} a menos para ser ativada para cada criatura lendária que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你们的任务正在刀尖边缘。稍有差池便会失败，全盘尽毁。但只要远征队精诚团结，就还有希望。」
foreignData.name: 加拉德瑞尔的水镜
foreignData.text: {5}，{T}：占卜1，然后抓一张牌。你每操控一个传奇生物，此异能便减少{1}来起动。

mainBoard.name: Mirror of Galadriel
mainBoard.originalText: {5}, {T}: Scry 1, then draw a card. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature you control.
mainBoard.text: {5}, {T}: Scry 1, then draw a card. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature you control.
